summary: Set up ICP custom domain (dirtydaves.co.uk, optionally www) for canister fd6rd-maaaa-aaaah-atocq-cai by adding required .well-known assets, optionally configuring .ic-assets.json headers, redeploying, and validating public accessibility.
architectural_notes: Custom domains to support: dirtydaves.co.uk and www.dirtydaves.co.uk

Serve static verification files at /.well-known/ic-domains (text/plain) and /.well-known/ii-alternative-origins (application/json); consider adding .ic-assets.json to control content-type and disable caching (max_age: 0)

existing_features.title:
Ensure the deployed frontend serves a `/.well-known/ic-domains` text file that contains exactly two lines (one domain per line) with no extra spaces, quotes, or trailing blank lines:
1) `dirtydaves.co.uk`
2) `www.dirtydaves.co.uk`
The file must be located at `frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains` so it is included in the static asset deployment.

Update the production smoke test documentation to reflect the new expected `/.well-known/ic-domains` content (two lines including `www`) and add a verification check for `/.well-known/ii-alternative-origins` returning the exact JSON payload.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add ICP custom domain support for dirtydaves.co.uk (and www) by creating /.well-known/ic-domains and /.well-known/ii-alternative-origins (plus optional .ic-assets.json), redeploying to canister fd6rd-maaaa-aaaah-atocq-cai, and verifying files are publicly accessible.

Add a short post-deploy checklist note (in an existing deployment/production doc) listing the remaining manual steps outside Caffeine for domain setup for canister `fd6rd-maaaa-aaaah-atocq-cai`, including the exact DNS records and the optional boundary-node registration/status URLs the user provided.

projectName: Configure ICP custom domain verification assets for dirtydaves.co.uk (+ www) and prepare for redeploy
